about.summary: Programs for Martinussen and Scheike (2006), `Dynamic Regression Models for Survival Data', Springer Verlag.  Plus more recent developments. Additive survival model, semiparametric proportional odds model, fast cumulative residuals, excess risk models and more. Flexible competing risks regression including GOF-tests. Two-stage frailty modelling. PLS for the additive risk model. Lasso in the 'ahaz' package.

Programs for Martinussen and Scheike (2006), `Dynamic Regression Models for Survival Data', Springer Verlag.  Plus more recent developments. Additive survival model, semiparametric proportional odds model, fast cumulative residuals, excess risk models and more. Flexible competing risks regression including GOF-tests. Two-stage frailty modelling. PLS for the additive risk model. Lasso in the 'ahaz' package.

name: r-timereg

about.summary: Programs for Martinussen and Scheike (2006), `Dynamic Regression Models for Survival Data', Springer Verlag.  Plus more recent developments. Additive survival model, semiparametric proportional odds model, fast cumulative residuals, excess risk models and more. Flexible competing risks regression including GOF-tests. Two-stage frailty modelling. PLS for the additive risk model. Lasso in the 'ahaz' package.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0.7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-timereg
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/timereg_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/timereg/timereg_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dc87ff3785507c2f759cf876ba978f4795b3836d407be18b0630f2a451489b5f

build:
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("m2w64_c") }}          # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-lava
    - r-numderiv
    - r-survival
    - libblas
    - liblapack
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-lava
    - r-numderiv
    - r-survival

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('timereg')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('timereg')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/scheike/timereg
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Programs for Martinussen and Scheike (2006), `Dynamic Regression Models for Survival Data', Springer Verlag.  Plus more recent developments. Additive survival model, semiparametric proportional odds model, fast cumulative residuals, excess risk models and more. Flexible competing risks regression including GOF-tests.
    Two-stage frailty modelling. PLS for the additive risk model. Lasso in the 'ahaz' package.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: timereg
# Title: Flexible Regression Models for Survival Data
# Version: 1.9.8
# Date: 2020-09-21
# Author: Thomas Scheike with contributions from Torben Martinussen, Jeremy Silver and Klaus Holst
# Maintainer: Thomas Scheike <ts@biostat.ku.dk>
# Description: Programs for Martinussen and Scheike (2006), `Dynamic Regression Models for Survival Data', Springer Verlag.  Plus more recent developments. Additive survival model, semiparametric proportional odds model, fast cumulative residuals, excess risk models and more. Flexible competing risks regression including GOF-tests. Two-stage frailty modelling. PLS for the additive risk model. Lasso in the 'ahaz' package.
# LazyLoad: yes
# URL: https://github.com/scheike/timereg
# Depends: R (>= 2.15), survival
# Imports: lava, numDeriv, stats, graphics, grDevices, utils, methods
# Suggests: mets,
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2020-09-21 06:40:29 UTC; bhd252
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-10-05 09:50:02 UTC

about.summary: Programs for Martinussen and Scheike (2006), `Dynamic Regression Models for Survival Data', Springer Verlag.  Plus more recent developments. Additive survival model, semiparametric proportional odds model, fast cumulative residuals, excess risk models and more. Flexible competing risks regression including GOF-tests. Two-stage frailty modelling. PLS for the additive risk model. Lasso in the 'ahaz' package.
